subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, the support men had their day in the sun. Matteo Trentin, who usually works for Cavendish on the Omega Pharma-Quick Step team, won Stage 14.
snippet: On Saturday, the support men had their day in the sun. Matteo Trentin, who usually works for Cavendish on the Omega Pharma-Quick Step team, won Stage 14.
